summary: I founded the NLP Skills Training Institute in 1991 in Dallas, Texas to provide human technologies for profound personal change and business excellence through executive and life coaching, workshops and seminar to certification level, and business programs.  Some time after moving to Arizona, the institute was expanded to the NLP Coaching & Skills Training Institute in 2003 and is currently the premier NLP coachig and training organization of the southwest USA.Specialties: BIll combines his 25 years experience coaching & training business leaders using Neuro Linguistic Programming (NLP). (the success technology the sky-rocketed Anthony Robbins to #1 motivational speaker in the world) with Breakthrough Technology, Excelerated Learning(c), and profiling technologies.  Bill has worked with individuals and business teams including Fortune 500 executives in the areas culture change, team building, leadership, rapport shills, selling, listening, and negotiating.
